T02D1343:358a-1: ma h'a su kha aa mri ta pra bha n'a ma /
T02D1343:358a-3: bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba /
T02D1343:358a-4: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1343:358a-6: rang gi gnas ni nyid du 'khyil //
T02D1343:358a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste //
T02D1343:358a-8: 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas //
T02D1343:358a-9: yang dag pa de rab tu bshad //
T02D1343:358a-10: yang dag pa yang rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1343:358a-11: de ni lus la rab tu gnas //
T02D1343:358a-12: 'di ltar shes pa'i lus nyid ni //
T02D1343:358a-13: bde ba chen po'i sku zhes bya //
T02D1343:358a-14: lte ba gsang ba'i drug cu bzhi'o//
T02D1343:358a-15: sprul pa'i yig 'bru dkar po bkod //
T02D1343:358a-16: a'a li k'a li g-yas dang g-yon //
T02D1343:358a-17: ye shes bzhi yi yi ge aom //
T02D1343:358a-18: dbus kyi ri bong 'dzin par ro //
T02D1343:358a-19: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad //
T02D1343:358a-20: sems kyi gnas su sku sogs brgyad //
T02D1343:358a-21: kha dog dkar po yi ge dgu / h'um pr'um tr'am hrim kham yig rnams //
T02D1343:358a-22: dbus nas byang du rim bzhin dgod //
T02D1343:358a-23: mtshams su lam la sogs pa bzhi //
T02D1343:358b-0: mtshan ma med pa'i @358b sku zhes bshad //
T02D1343:358b-1: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bcu drug / mgrin pa'i gnas su yang dag skyes //
T02D1343:358b-2: de yi ri bong 'dzin par aom //
T02D1343:358b-3: ya wa ra la yi ge rnams //
T02D1343:358b-4: shar nas byang du rim bzhin no //
T02D1343:358b-5: rtogs yul bcu rlung gnyis kyi gnas //
T02D1343:358b-7: sa bon zla ba rgyas 'dra ba //
T02D1343:358b-8: bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'khyil //
T02D1343:358b-9: sum cu rtsa gnyis rang bzhin gnas //
T02D1343:358b-10: de yi gnas na a'a li gnyis //
T02D1343:358b-11: g-yas dang g-yon gnyis mgo dang mjug / gcig tu phrad pas brgyan pa yin //
T02D1343:358b-12: de dbus ham las sra ma na //
T02D1343:358b-13: longs spyod mkhyen la bde chen thur //
T02D1343:358b-14: thabs dang shes rab tshul du gnas //
T02D1343:358b-15: chos dang sprul pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D1343:358b-16: kun gyi dbus nas ri bong 'dzin //
T02D1343:358b-17: 'khor lo yi ge kha dog dkar //
T02D1343:358b-19: ha gnyis gnas su bsam par bya //
T02D1343:358b-20: de steng ram byung gru gsum me //
T02D1343:358b-21: rang gi gnas su bsam par bya //
T02D1343:358b-22: de ltar rang bzhin kun shes nas //
T02D1343:358b-23: ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs las //
T02D1343:358b-24: rlung gis me bus bcu drug 'bar //
T02D1343:358b-25: de nyid ye shes me zhes bya //
T02D1343:358b-26: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
T02D1343:358b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02D1343:358b-28: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas //
T02D1343:358b-29: kun gyi lus bsregs mgo gcig bsams //
T02D1343:358b-31: bsregs nas g-yas 'byung sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1343:358b-32: sems can kun bsregs dbu ma g-yon //
T02D1343:358b-33: thim ste bde chen g-yon nas bskor //
T02D1343:358b-34: bsregs nas rna ba g-yas su 'du //
T02D1343:358b-35: mkha' 'gro ma kun bsregs gcig byed //
T02D1343:358b-36: aa ba dh'u t'i'i gnas nas byung //
T02D1343:358b-37: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med bsregs //
T02D1343:358b-38: steng gi zhabs su sra ma na //
T02D1343:358b-39: bde ba chen po'i lus kyang skyes //
T02D1343:358b-40: ham dkar las byung ser po dkar //
T02D1343:358b-41: lus skyes mi la ye shes bskyed //
T02D1343:358b-42: de ru ma nus chu yi rtsa //
T02D1343:358b-43: g-yon gyi rtsa nas sprul pa ru //
T02D1343:358b-44: der ni yang dag rab tu gzung //
T02D1343:358b-45: de ru mi gnas sam po ka / rtsa ba'i rdo rje lam nas 'gro //
T02D1343:358b-46: sam po ka nas chos sku'o //
T02D1343:358b-47: lus rnams yang dag skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1343:358b-48: skyes nas bskal pa'i bar du gnas //
T02D1343:358b-49: chos kyi gnas su ma skyes na //
T02D1343:358b-50: nir ma ka yi gnas su bsam //
T02D1343:358b-51: yang dang yang du 'di bzhin bya //
T02D1343:359a-0: @359a * // rnam rtog med pa'i rnal 'byor skye //
T02D1343:359a-1: yar gyis bsregs shing mar gyis gso //
T02D1343:359a-3: rtag tu 'di la blta bar bya //
T02D1343:359a-4: nam zhig 'di la brten gyur na //
T02D1343:359a-5: mtshan ma lnga 'am yang na g-yo //
T02D1343:359a-7: bcad pas bzhi po yang yang zhu //
T02D1343:359a-8: rtsa ba'i rdo rje lam nas ni //
T02D1343:359a-11: bde ba chen po'i sku zhes bya //
T02D1343:359a-12: gzhan gyi don sogs yon tan rnams //
T02D1343:359a-13: 'bad pa med par lhun gyis grub //
T02D1343:359a-14: bla na med pa'i dgongs rgyud 'di //
T02D1343:359a-15: dpal gyi zhabs kyis bdag la bstan //
T02D1343:359a-17: bde ba chen po zhes su bstan //
T02D1343:359a-18: sbyor ba'i rgyud ni thams cad las //
T02D1343:359a-19: rgyal ba rnams kyis sbas ba bshad //
T02D1343:359a-20: shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i //
T02D1343:359a-21: snod ldan bdag nyid chen pos gzung //
T02D1343:359a-22: lus sems bde bar spyad nas ni //
T02D1343:359a-23: nyid mtshams sbyor ba bsten par bya //
T02D1343:359a-24: bdag gis brtsams kyi bdud rtsi 'od //
T02D1343:359a-25: 'di ltar khams gsum kun kyang de //
T02D1343:359a-27: yang dag bde bas 'tsho bar shog / rnal 'byor
T02D1343:359a-28: gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal ye shes rin po
